title: T206 Ty Cobb Red Back Vg For trade
author: Archive

posts.post_title: T206 Ty Cobb Red Back Vg For trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Derek
I am looking to trade my T206 Red Back cobb. I feel it's a solid Vg grade. It has slight wear on all 4 corners less than most PSA or SGC 3s. It is a little OC tb but it has great color and gloss. It also has a small crease on the left edge going to the ear of Cobb, and there is another on on the other side that is about 4-5 mm long.  It is 100% authentic and will grade. The white spots in the top and right corners are not on the card, they were caused by the scanner. 
I am interested in the following cards.
Low grade Bat on or off Cobb T206
SGC or PSA 1 Wagners E cards
Mainly interested in PSA 8-9 1960-1973 Baseball Hofers Mantle,Rose,Aaron, Mays, Clemente and other low key HOFers
T206 Cy Young Green Port
Nap Lajoie and ANY 1911 T3s or T9s.
1956-1968 Football Rookies PSA 7-8
I am also looking for 
1963 Pete Rose PSA or SGC graded
1964-1970 Pete Rose PSA or SGC 7-9
1960-1965 Willie Mays PSA 7-9
1963 PSA 7-8 Mantle, 1966 PSA 7-8 Mantle, 1965 PSA 7-8 Mantle
1951 BOwman Mantle SGC PSA 1 or Auth
PSA 9 Jim brown, Bart Starr, Gayle Sayers, Joe Namath.
Or anything that might be similar to these.

Please let me know if you are interested.
